itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Stateside Vodka in Philadelphia to pick every single College Football Bowl game, discuss the key offseason MLB free agents this winter, as well as pick this weekend's NFL games.  They also discuss how the biggest stars in the NFL likely ruined your fantasy football playoffs already.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Stateside Vodka in Philadelphia to pick every single College Football Bowl game, discuss the key offseason MLB free agents this winter, as well as pick this weekend's NFL games.  They also discuss how the biggest stars in the NFL likely ruined your fantasy football playoffs already.
